auth.magicLink: Send the magic link by email
auth.magicLinkInstructions:
No password is required.

We will send you a magic link to login by email.

If you use Slack, Notion or Wallet of Satoshi you may be familiar with this login method.

To keep your account safe, please enable 2FA on your email account.
auth.checkEmail: Click the link sent by email to login your account
